startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Agent list pages to start from. Defaults to the Jacksonville agents index.

maxPages.title: Max list pages to crawl
maxPages.description: Upper limit for paginated list pages to enqueue (prevents infinite loops).

maxConcurrency.title: Max concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: How many pages to crawl in parallel. Increase carefully to avoid throttling/blocks.

proxy.title: Proxy configuration
proxy.description: Use Apify Proxy or your own proxy for reliability and to reduce blocking.
